General.Name: Yangling Metron New Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Yangling Metron New Material Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells electroplated diamond wires and tools. The company's diamond wires are used in various applications, including silicon slicing, crystal and magnetic material cutting, and sapphire cutting and squaring. It has strategic partnership agreements with GCL-Poly, JinkoSolar, Longi, etc. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Yangling, China.

0.Name: Ms. Xiang  Zhou
0.Title: Sec. of the Board, CFO & Non-Independent Director
